translations: n.屏蔽选项设置；效果移除（removal 的复数）

phrs.translation: 热排出；热量排除；排热；取热

sentences.sentence: Welcome to the third episode of our URL removals series!
sentences.translation: 欢迎来到我们的网址删除系列第三辑！

sentences.sentence: Comparing the two folders will show the differences (additions and removals of files) in detail.
sentences.translation: 比较两个文件夹，您将会发现明细上的差异之处(文件的其余部分)。

sentences.sentence: Long answer: both can be used to manage all software installations removals, and both will do a good job.
sentences.translation: 长一点的回答：两者均能用来管理所有软件的安装和卸载，并且都做的挺好。
